definition: lit. the birds are over, the bow is put away (idiom); fig. to get rid of sb once he has served his purpose
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
a bow (weapon)/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to bend/to arch (one's back etc)
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect
not recognizing one's family (idiom); self-centered and not making any allowances for the needs of one's relatives
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end

definition: lit. to bring a bramble and ask for punishment (idiom)/fig. to offer sb a humble apology
lit. to drive a duck onto a perch (idiom)/fig. to push sb to do sth way beyond their ability
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
